column4: ehaney: there's a post here that might provide some clues: http://www.vlent.nl/weblog/2010/09/06/locked-myself-out-root-account-ec2-ubuntu-instance/
he's talking about mounting the drive from the existing instance on a new instance; not sure if it applies to your setup though
if MS set up with a root password needed as your supposer to life would be easier for sure
